name: health-buddy-fullstack
description: Health Buddy - A complete wellness tracking application with frontend, backend, and admin

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Health Buddy Team
